text: Abdul-Karim Mousavi Ardebili (; January 28, 1926 - November 23, 2016) was an Iranian politician and Muslim leader. He served as the head of legal system of Iran for about 8 years after terror of Dr. Beheshti until death of Khomeini. He was a marja of the Twelver branch of Shia Islam. He was born in Ardabil. He died in Tehran on 23 November 2016. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Chief Justices of Iran
title: Abdul-Karim Mousavi Ardebili
